question: You are going to move out of your apartment in a English-speaking country. Your landlord is a very good person, who has assisted you a lot during your stay. Meanwhile, your friend would like to rent the flat after you. Write a letter to your landlord.In your letter,•	Let your landlord know that you will be leaving•	Thank you landlord for his/her help•	Tel him/her about your friend
text: I am writing this letter to notify you of my intention to vacate the apartment I am presently occupying on your property at Hobart by 12th August 2022.

Firstly, it Is a very difficult decision for me having spent nearly four years as your tenant couple with the cordial relationship we shared. Besides, I have to leave because I have been transferred to our new station at Berth as the station manager.

Moreover, let me use this medium to show my appreciation for all the help you have offered me to make my stay a memorable one at your property. Especially, the free food coach you offered to perfect my cook skills. Forever, I will be grateful.

Secondly, my best friend Thomas will like to take over the house as a tenant after my vacation. Also,he  has just been transferred to Hobart media centre and he needs  accommodation close to his place of work. Thomas is a reliable, neat and honest fellow, hence, I can recommend him that you will surely enjoy his stay in the apartment as your neighbour.
Lastly, I hope my friend will be considered and the house will be reserved for him. Furthermore, thanks a bunch for your anticipated cooperation.
